name: learning-collaborative-maps
description: Interactive map to help coordinate healthy relationship education in the Chicago area.

config.requireargs: --require leaflet --require react --require react-dom --require react-router --require es6-promise --require isomorphic-fetch --require flux --require object-assign --require keymirror --require d3 --require jquery --require typeahead.js
config.externalargs: --external leaflet --external react --external react-dom --external react-router --external es6-promise --external isomorphic-fetch --external flux --external object-assign --external keymirror --external d3 --external jquery --external typeahead.js

scripts.build:vendorjs: mkdir -p public/js && browserify $npm_package_config_requireargs --debug -p [minifyify --map vendor.min.js.map --output public/js/vendor.min.js.map] > public/js/vendor.min.js
scripts.build:app: mkdir -p public/js && browserify $npm_package_config_externalargs --debug -p [minifyify --map learningcollaborative.min.js.map --output public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js.map] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone LearningCollaborative js/src/learningcollaborative.js > public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js
scripts.build:vendorstyles: mkdir -p public/css && cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images public/css && cat node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css | cleancss --source-map --output public/css/vendor.css
scripts.build:styles: mkdir -p css && node-sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss sass/styles.scss public/css/styles.css
scripts.build: run-p build:vendorjs build:app build:vendorstyles build:styles build:dist
scripts.watch:app: watchify $npm_package_config_externalargs --debug -p [minifyify --map learningcollaborative.min.js.map --output public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js.map] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone LearningCollaborative --outfile public/js/learningcollaborative.min.js js/src/learningcollaborative.js

author: Geoff Hing <geoffhing@gmail.com>
